about_the_game:
Duck Norris Tales is pixel run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Featuring highly stylized pixel art inspired by the arcade games from the '90s.

STORY

Step into the feathers of a brave duck on a mission of revenge after aliens destroy his favorite ice cream shop! Join him on an epic journey through the depths of the Earth as he uncovers secrets, battles monsters, and rallies the Gods to aid in his quest. Can he save humanity along the way?

THE BATTLE

The Gods are divided and at war, and it's up to you to restore peace and earn their respect. Each time you challenge a God, you have the chance to gain their blessing and grow stronger! Learn new abilities and make new allies to unlock powerful super moves as you strive to bring balance.

Uncover secrets about the world and unlock devastating super attacks as you cleanse the land.

name: Duck Norris Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Duck Norris Tales is a run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Play as a brave duck saving the world from an alien invasion. Make friends, discover secrets, wield face melting weapons and most of all shoot first and ask questions later.
